Name: After The War
About the game: Keep your family and yourself alive in this ruined city and escape from here. Get out of your house, investigate, kill other people and steal their belongings. Find food and medicine for your family, keep them alive. Open lockers, break doors. Investigate cabinets, drawers, chests and find valuable items. Create a bed to sleep, a chest to store things, fire to heat and cook. Place them to your house. Shop with vendors around you, buy weapons, armor, medicine, and wear them. For an easier journey, find a car, repair it, fill up with petrol. Find people who will save you and your family here and make a deal.
